Title: Provides for eminent domain reform and creates the "home and property protection act"; appropriation
Summary: Provides for eminent domain reform; creates the "home and property protection act"; creates a temporary state commission to examine eminent domain laws.
LawCode: Amd §§103, 204 & 207, add §204-a, EDP L; amd §1411, N-PC L; add §858-c, Gen Muni L; add §1831-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the eminent domain procedure law, the not-for-profit corporation law, the general municipal law and the public authorities law, in relation to eminent domain reform; creating the "home and property protection act" providing for the creation of a temporary state commission to examine eminent domain laws and make recommendations for further reforms; making an appropriation therefor; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
